name: dotenvx-pm2
description: Example usage of dotenvx with pm2
author: Michael Kalygin

scripts.start:json:simple: SH=shell SH_DE=shell SH_PM=shell SH_DE_PM=shell dotenvx run --env-file .env -- ../../bin/pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs
scripts.start:json:overload: SH=shell SH_DE=shell SH_PM=shell SH_DE_PM=shell dotenvx run --env-file .env --overload -- ../../bin/pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs
scripts.start:pid:simple: SH=shell SH_DE=shell SH_PM=shell SH_DE_PM=shell dotenvx run --env-file .env -- ../../bin/pm2 start forked_app clustered_app
scripts.start:pid:overload: SH=shell SH_DE=shell SH_PM=shell SH_DE_PM=shell dotenvx run --env-file .env --overload -- ../../bin/pm2 start forked_app clustered_app
scripts.reload:json:simple: SH=shell SH_DE=shell SH_PM=shell SH_DE_PM=shell dotenvx run --env-file .env -- ../../bin/pm2 reload ecosystem.config.cjs --update-env
scripts.reload:json:overload: SH=shell SH_DE=shell SH_PM=shell SH_DE_PM=shell dotenvx run --env-file .env --overload -- ../../bin/pm2 reload ecosystem.config.cjs --update-env
scripts.reload:pid:simple: SH=shell SH_DE=shell SH_PM=shell SH_DE_PM=shell dotenvx run --env-file .env -- ../../bin/pm2 reload forked_app clustered_app --update-env
scripts.reload:pid:overload: SH=shell SH_DE=shell SH_PM=shell SH_DE_PM=shell dotenvx run --env-file .env --overload -- ../../bin/pm2 reload forked_app clustered_app --update-env
